document.full_text: there is a risk that nissan motor co's  u.s. market share, which has been on the rise, may fall due to a lack of auto parts from japan, north american chairman carlos tavares said on wednesday.
document.title: nissan: u.s. market share may fall due to parts
lines_and_colors: there is a risk that nissan motor co's  u.s. market share, which has been on the rise, may fall due to a lack of auto parts from japan, north american chairman carlos tavares said on wednesday.
